TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntitySet extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySetBase

Docs.summary: Represents an entity set in a conceptual model. An EntitySet for an <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"> contains instances of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"> or any of its subtypes. More than one EntitySet can be defined by using the same <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the entity sets in a conceptual model, see [Entity Sets (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/464334ee-6a65-4b9e-b081-65efbc182807).

Docs.summary: Gets the built-in type kind for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet>.

Docs.summary: Gets the entity type of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet">.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"> object that represents the entity type of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet>.
